attributes.action: Call for a national inquiry into grooming gangs throughout the UK
attributes.additional_details: Our children are the future of this country and are more important than anything else on the Government's agenda.  It is not acceptable that our Government is happy to ignore what is happening to our young girls and women in so many towns and cities around the UK.  People need to be held accountable for the cover up of these heinous crimes.  We demand a national public inquiry now.
attributes.background: Following recent reports on grooming gangs, we find that this is happening in at least 50 cities in the UK, it is time for a transparent national joined up inquiry of this abhorrent crime practiced by a majority of Pakistani muslin men.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
